name: Orc Commoner

trait.name: Aggressive
text: As a bonus action, <$title_short_name$> can move up to your speed toward a hostile creature that they can see.

action.name: Club
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 167
